about_the_game:
In the world of Typing Valley, once lush and lively, weeds and silence now reign. Using your hands and keyboard, you’ll gradually restore its former splendor and warmth. Sowing seeds, watering crops, harvesting produce, and cooking hearty meals—all in gentle keystrokes that help you lose track of time and find quiet contentment.

Yet, beyond the tranquil fields and savory dishes, you’ll discover neighbors and travelers, each with their own stories and dreams: some longing for distant adventures, others cherishing childhood memories, or striving to revive a once-bustling shop. Your goodwill and support will help them rediscover their aspirations.

As you converse, assist, and guide them through doubts and challenges, the town’s spirit will steadily revive through shared understanding and care. With the changing seasons and your improving skills, you’ll witness this farmland evolve from barren to abundant, accompanied by soft laughter echoing through its streets and unspoken gratitude flowing between neighbors. The serenity and happiness here don’t spring from grand miracles, but rather from each small act of kindness and companionship.

---

Key Features

  • Idyllic Farm Life: Immerse yourself in a peaceful, pressure-free countryside. Tend crops, explore at your own pace, and drift into a soothing rural rhythm without any constraints.

  • Typing-Based Gameplay: All interactions are carried out through typing. This unique design infuses the farming experience with a special charm, allowing you to effortlessly slip into a state of flow where time fades away and pure, tranquil joy remains.

  • Growth and Harvests: Whether it’s harvesting fruits, fishing, planting crops, or raising livestock, every corner of your farm will naturally flourish under your careful planning. As various farming activities gradually unlock, your abilities will continue to grow. Watching the once barren farm thrive through your efforts, transforming from desolation to abundance, you’ll be crafting your own unique farming story.

  • Restaurant Management: Run a cozy, welcoming restaurant. Gather fresh ingredients from your fields or the nearby waters and serve delicious meals to local townsfolk. With wood and ore, you can upgrade and refine your establishment, adding new dishes and enhancing the culinary experience.

  • Community Life: Meet a variety of distinctive neighbors and travelers. Listen to their stories, build friendships, and help them achieve their dreams. Together, you’ll restore the town’s lively atmosphere and rekindle its gentle warmth.

  • Heartfelt Post Office: At the post office, craft charming postcards and pen heartfelt messages. Let your words bring comfort and healing to others, brightening their days.

  • Exploration: Surrounded by forests, mines, and distant isles, your surroundings await discovery. Gather new resources, uncover hidden histories, and record your findings in the museum, sharing the rich tale of Typing Harvest’s land.

  • Typing-Based Fishing: Even the tranquil act of fishing relies on typing. Through patient keystrokes, reel in your catch and add a simple, relaxing delight to your daily life.

  • Typing Practice and Challenges: From single characters to full paragraphs, the game’s varied typing tasks help you improve your skills in a pleasant, engaging manner. Say goodbye to dull drills—learn and grow as you play, reaping both enjoyment and confidence.

  • Language Learning: With support for multiple languages and the option to separate display and typing languages, you can enjoy the game in your native tongue while practicing input in another. Expand your linguistic horizons naturally as you cultivate your farm and friendships.

short_description: “Typing Valley” artfully blends typing with pastoral farming. Tap your keyboard to gather, grow, harvest, and run a cozy restaurant. With your efforts, overgrown fields revive, restoring peace and happiness to the entire town.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
